```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
library(ggthemes)

```


```{r}
ev_raw <- read.csv("Data/EarlyVoting_RAW_data.csv") 

ev_raw <- ev_raw |>
  clean_names()
glimpse(ev_raw)
```

```{r}
#votes by day 
votes_by_day <- ev_raw |> 
  summarise(across(starts_with("day"), \(x) sum(x, na.rm = TRUE)))

#votes by party
votes_by_party <- ev_raw |>
  group_by(party_code) |> 
  summarise(total_votes = sum(day1, day2, day3, day4, day5, day6, day7, day8, na.rm = TRUE)) |> 
  arrange(party_code)
